articles.description: The jihadists have ordered all women to stay at home as a 'temporary procedure', cracked down on female-led protests in Kabul and appointed an all-male cabinet on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The Taliban will ban Afghan women from playing sport because 'their face and body will not be covered,' the terror group confirmed today. 
The jihadists have ordered all women to stay at home as a '… [+9814 chars]

articles.title: Steven Gerrard is every inch the proud dad for son Lio's first day of school - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'First day for my little mate,' Steven told his followers as his son grinned with excitement to get in the classroom.
articles.content:
Steven Gerrard waved off his four-year-old son Lio on his first day of school on Wednesday.
